title: Photography
subtitle: Have a look at photos I took
content:
A small gallery of recent photos I took. I mostly stick to simple stuff, with high interest in landscape and street photography. Equipment I use:
  • Sony Alpha 6400
  • Sony 18-134mm f/3.5-5.6
  • Cullmann Alpha 2800
